Can move and attack with the Units of this Tribe.
Can found cities near their settlements.
Will share your Diplomatic state with other Tribes.
Can only have an Alliance with one Tribe.
Alliance will last until the end of the current Leader's reign.

Can only have an Alliance with one other Player.
An Ally will automatically declare War on another Player that declares War on their Ally.
Ambition is the Opinion change from Population ({0_value} per).
Can Buy Land Tiles adjacent to your territory.
The Tribe will send units to Pillage your Cities

Culture Events occur whenever the City's Culture bar hits the next threshold.
Create a great deal of revenue by travelling to a distant city

You cannot attack each other. Peace will last until the end of the current Leader's reign. Their units are less likely to declare War or send Raiders against you. They can enter and heal in your territory.
You cannot attack each other. They are less likely to declare War against you. You can enter and heal in each other's territory.
You can attack each other freely.
Disloyalty is the yearly Opinion change from {0_discontentIcon} Level.
Families with less Cities than the others have higher Envy.
